name: Myth Hunters
description:
Embark on a journey to locales unknown and lands forgotten in Myth Hunters. You will join the League of Adventurers in a world of mystery, myth, and steam technology as you search for artifacts lost to the ages. Though led by the eccentric Professor Cog, you will have to fend for yourself as you voyage across the wintry peaks of the Himalayas. Traverse treacherous mountain paths and solve sinister puzzles before time runs out and your prize is lost to the mountains forever.

Starring James Arnold Taylor and Yuri Lowenthal, Myth Hunters is brought to you by Arabian Art Studios, virtual reality veterans and the creators of Cursed Sanctum.
